item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 28, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:

9. 1584 LAN party photos from 1996 – 2010 from Australia's island state archived (59 points | 21 comments)

12. DivestOS ROM shuts after ten years (84 points | 49 comments)

27. Pseudonymity in Academic Publishing (19 points | 3 comments)

29. Show HN: Houseplant – Database Migrations for ClickHouse (33 points | 6 comments)
30. Harper (YC W25) Is Hiring Founding Engineer #2 ( | hide)
